description: A small data set of compounds and assay results extracted from ChEMBL

compound_id.description: Unique identifier for a compound, this is the primary key.

molecular_weight.description: The weight of the compound, could be plotted on the X axis.

ALogP.description: Indicates if the compound will dissolve in water or not, could be plotted on the Y axis.

molecular_formula.description: A short string representation of the compound.

num_rings.description: A count of the rings in the compound, could be used to color a plot. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ring_(chemistry)

image.description: Compounds are visualised as 2D graphs, path to a pre-calculated png image of the compound.

assay_results.description: The assay results for the compound (could be shown as Kd = 19uM) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Assay.

target.description: The long name of the biological target used in the assay.

result.description: The result type of the assay.
